```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}

data <- read.csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")

baltimore_data <- data %>%
  filter(city == "Baltimore") %>%
  mutate(date = ymd(reported_date),
          month = month(date),
          year = year(date))

monthly_data <- baltimore_data %>%
  group_by(year = year(date), month = month(date)) %>%
  summarize(homicides = n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(
    date = make_date(year, month, 1),
    season = ifelse(month(month) %in% c(5:10), "Summer", "Winter"))

monthly_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = homicides, fill = season)) 

```
